alert.note: Alert for Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:55PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wilkinson and central Twiggs Counties through 430 PM EST... At 355 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Marion, or near Jeffersonville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Jeffersonville, Danville, Marion, District Path, Bullard and Ripley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central Georgia.
